document_data.mainbody:
Thaxllssillyia was a shadow dragon brought from the Plane of Shadow by the Shade Lord during his attempt to extend his influence onto the Material Plane.
Prior to 1369 DR, Thaxllssillyia was left to guard the entrance into the Shade Lords inner lair in the old temple to Amaunator near the Umar Hills.
Gorions Ward and party may have been given a wardstone by the prophetess, Amauna to bypass the dragon. Thaxllssillyias hide, being that of a shadow dragon, could be made into a powerful set of light armor.
